title: My Pixel 3 touch sensitivity is not working fine
content:
I'm having multiple troubles with touch:
1. When I try to roll the screen with a swipe gesture my device read it as a single touch, selecting whatever is in the screen.
2. When typing on keyboard some keys are not typed.

This is a problem Im having since November maybe, I waited for an update to be back as it used to be but nothing has happened.

I tried all on "Fix touchscreen" tips, factory reset included. Nothing changed.

Help please ðŸ¥º
